content: crocheted mini christmas stocking with cuffed folded top is 6 inches tall option for no folded cuff is worked by chaining 8 from toe instead of 12 stitches work decreases around heel and add crocheted scalloped trim in contrasting yarn at the top another option is to chain 8 instead of 12 and add 4-5 row of single_crochet around the top for a contrasting fold-over cuff as shown in the last photo
